attributes.action: Prevent the closure of the Post office at  258 Balham High Road SW17
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Post Office is a key part of a parade of shops midway between Balham and Tooting Bec; otherwise the nearest Post Offices are a considerable walk away. The main Post Office at Balham is notorious for being extremely busy and providing a slow service. The Post Office at 258 Balham High Road must be retained

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
